channel.title: Comments on: App Review: Thanksgiving Freedom

item.title: By: charlesmckeever
item.dc:creator: charlesmckeever
item.description: Corona Labs just announced a new addition to their physics api that opens up some new options for side scroller games like this one. We'll be talking about event.contact on today's show, but here's a link so you can check it out in advance http://www.coronalabs.com/blog/2012/11/27/introducing-physics-event-contact/
item.content:encoded: Corona Labs just announced a new addition to their physics api that opens up some new options for side scroller games like this one. We’ll be talking about event.contact on today’s show, but here’s a link so you can check it out in advance http://www.coronalabs.com/blog/2012/11/27/introducing-physics-event-contact/
